channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report E-2025020393
item.description:
Report E-2025020393

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-28T00:58:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-25
  • City: PIEDMONT
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On February 25, 2025, one (1) 55-gallon drum of resin solution was damaged and released approximately two (2) gallons of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental (FCE) to remediate the site. The crew utilized degreaser and absorbents to remediate the trailer. All impacted material was containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum.
